capabilities.name: closing-scanner
capabilities.description: Scans Polymarket for markets closing within 72 hours
capabilities.testNotes: Works - fetches from Gamma API and detects momentum

capabilities.name: health-check
capabilities.description: Analyzes system state and proposes improvements
capabilities.testNotes: Works - identified 1 issue and created proposal

capabilities.name: leaderboard-tracker
capabilities.description: Tracks top Polymarket traders and their positions
capabilities.testNotes: Works - weekly profit API returns 400, but all-time works. Fetched 5 traders with 4 positions.

capabilities.name: price-tracker
capabilities.description: Tracks price history for monitored markets. Sends alerts for significant movements.
capabilities.testNotes: Works - updates portfolio prices from CLOB API

capabilities.name: telegram-bot
capabilities.testNotes: Works - code reviewed, uses axios for Telegram API

capabilities.name: telegram-alerts
capabilities.description: Centralized alert system for trading events (trades, exits, hypotheses, prices)
capabilities.testNotes: Works - well-structured typed alerts with formatters

capabilities.name: price-drift-detector
capabilities.description: Monitors markets for sudden price movements (>5% in 1h). Generates follow-signal hypotheses for informed money detection.
capabilities.testNotes: Works - code reviewed, well-structured drift detection

capabilities.name: hypothesis-tester
capabilities.description: Automated hypothesis testing framework. Monitors entry/exit conditions, executes paper trades, tracks results, auto-promotes/kills based on performance.
capabilities.testNotes: Works - comprehensive 780-line pipeline with full trade lifecycle

capabilities.name: daily-briefing
capabilities.description: Sends daily portfolio/hypothesis summary to Telegram. Asks user for priorities.
capabilities.testNotes: Registered during capability audit - was missing from registry

deprecated.name: leaderboard-scraper
deprecated.description: Browser Use based scraper for Polymarket leaderboard
deprecated.reason: Superseded by leaderboard-tracker (cap-003) which uses direct API calls instead of browser automation

gaps.name: automated-order-placement
gaps.description: CLOB order placement system for market making
gaps.notes: Requires wallet integration, API keys, significant infrastructure

gaps.name: volume-analysis-tool
gaps.description: Analyze volume/probability ratios to find anomalies

gaps.name: arbitrage-scanner
gaps.description: Compare related markets to find price discrepancies
gaps.notes: Time POY Human vs AI market showed 2.5% gap

gaps.name: backtest-framework
gaps.description: Historical data analysis for strategy validation

findings: Added cap-009 (daily-briefing) - was missing from registry
hyp-004 blocker should be removed - leaderboard-tracker complete
